channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Alberta on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Almost Free: Self-concordance in Natural Exponential Families and an Application to Bandits
item.description: Generalized linear bandits with subexponential reward distributions are self-concordant, enabling second-order regret bounds free of exponential dependence on problem parameters.

item.title: Confident Natural Policy Gradient for Local Planning in q_œÄ-realizable Constrained MDPs
item.description: Confident-NPG-CMDP: First primal-dual algorithm achieving polynomial sample complexity for solving constrained Markov decision processes (CMDPs) using function approximation and local access model.

item.title: Deep Policy Gradient Methods Without Batch Updates, Target Networks, or Replay Buffers
item.description: Deep RL excels in simulated robotics, but struggles with real-world limitations like limited computational resources. This paper introduces Action Value Gradient (AVG), a novel incremental deep polic…

item.title: Learning Truncated Causal History Model for Video Restoration
item.description: TURTLE: a novel video restoration framework that learns a truncated causal history model for efficient and high-performing video restoration, achieving state-of-the-art results on various benchmark ta…
